net.hudup.core.data

Interface DatasetRemote

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatasetAbstract, DatasetRemoteWrapper, KBasePointer, NullPointer, Pointer, Scanner, ScannerImpl, SemiScanner, SemiScannerExt, ServerPointer, Snapshot, SnapshotImpl

    public interface DatasetRemote
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface represents remote dataset.
    Version:
    12.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Summary

      Remote unexporting remote dataset.

      • remoteGetConfig

        DataConfig remoteGetConfig()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting configuration of rating data remotely.
        Returns:
        Configuration of rating data DataConfig
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteFetchUserIds

        Fetcher<java.lang.Integer> remoteFetchUserIds()
                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving collection of user ID (s) via Fetcher remotely.
        Returns:
        Fetcher of user ID (s).
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetUserId

        int remoteGetUserId(java.io.Serializable externalUserId)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        In the case that a user ID is associated with an external user ID stored in external database, this function returns the user ID of specified external user ID remotely.
        Parameters:
        externalUserId - External user ID stored in external database
        Returns:
        The user ID associated with the specified external user ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetUserExternalRecord

        ExternalRecord remoteGetUserExternalRecord(int userId)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely external user ID associated with the specified user ID stored in this Dataset. In the case that Dataset is linked to an external database, each user ID in Dataset has different ID in such external database.
        Parameters:
        userId - specified internal user identifier.
        Returns:
        The external record ExternalRecord that contains the external user ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteFetchItemIds

        Fetcher<java.lang.Integer> remoteFetchItemIds()
                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving collection of item ID (s) via Fetcher remotely.
        Returns:
        Fetcher of item ID (s)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetItemId

        int remoteGetItemId(java.io.Serializable externalItemId)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        In the case that an item ID is associated with an external item ID stored in external database, this function returns remotely the item ID of specified external item ID.
        Parameters:
        externalItemId - External item ID stored in external database
        Returns:
        The item ID associated with the specified external item ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetItemExternalRecord

        ExternalRecord remoteGetItemExternalRecord(int itemId)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely external item ID associated with the specified item ID stored in this Dataset. In the case that Dataset is linked to an external database, each item ID in Dataset has different ID in such external database.
        Parameters:
        itemId - specified internal item identifier.
        Returns:
        The external record ExternalRecord that contains the external item ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetRating

        Rating remoteGetRating(int userId,
                       int itemId)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting Rating of specified user ID and item ID remotely. Rating includes rating value, rated date and context information.
        Parameters:
        userId - Specified user ID
        itemId - Specified item ID
        Returns:
        Rating of specified user ID and item ID includes rating value, rated date and context information
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteCreateUserMatrix

        RatingMatrix remoteCreateUserMatrix()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creating remotely the user-based rating matrix whose each row represents ratings that a concrete user gives to many items. Please be careful to use this method in case of huge Dataset because such matrix is stored in memory.
        Returns:
        User-based rating matrix via RatingMatrix
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteCreateItemMatrix

        RatingMatrix remoteCreateItemMatrix()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creating remotely the item-based rating matrix whose each row represents ratings that a concrete item receives from many users. Please be careful to use this method in case of huge Dataset because such matrix is stored in memory.
        Returns:
        Item-based rating matrix via RatingMatrix
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetUserProfile

        Profile remoteGetUserProfile(int userId)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting Profile of specified user ID remotely. Profile contains associative information of a given subject: user, item, context, etc. For example, Profile of user ID 1 can contains: John, male, john at mail.com
        Parameters:
        userId - Specified user ID
        Returns:
        Profile of specified user ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteFetchUserProfiles

        Fetcher<Profile> remoteFetchUserProfiles()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving collection of user Profile (s) via Fetcher remotely. Profile contains associative information of a given subject: user, item, context, etc. For example, Profile of user ID 1 can contains: John, male, john at mail.com.
        Returns:
        Fetcher of user Profile (s)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetUserAttributes

        AttributeList remoteGetUserAttributes()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting list of user attributes via AttributeList remotely. For example, user attributes can include user name, gender, email address, etc.
        Returns:
        AttributeList represents list of user attributes
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetItemProfile

        Profile remoteGetItemProfile(int itemId)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting Profile of specified item ID remotely. Profile contains associative information of a given subject: user, item, context, etc. For example, Profile of item ID 1 can contains: Computer COM1, CPU Intel, 2GB RAM.
        Parameters:
        itemId - Specified item ID
        Returns:
        Profile of specified item ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteFetchItemProfiles

        Fetcher<Profile> remoteFetchItemProfiles()
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving collection of item Profile (s) via Fetcher remotely. Profile contains associative information of a given subject: user, item, context, etc. For example, Profile of item ID 1 can contains: Computer COM1, CPU Intel, 2GB RAM.
        Returns:
        Fetcher of item Profile (s)
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetItemAttributes

        AttributeList remoteGetItemAttributes()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting list of item attributes via AttributeList remotely. For example, item attributes can include item name, serial number, type, price, etc.
        Returns:
        AttributeList represents list of item attributes
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteProfileOf

        Profile remoteProfileOf(Context context)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting profile of the specified Context remotely. Context represents time, location, companion associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. Context is an instance of context template ContextTemplate with specific value.
        Parameters:
        context - Specified Context
        Returns:
        Profile of specified Context
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteProfilesOf

        Profiles remoteProfilesOf(int ctxTemplateId)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely Profile (s) collection of specified context template ID via Profiles. Please see ContextTemplate and ContextTemplateSchema for more details of context template.
        Parameters:
        ctxTemplateId - Specified context template ID
        Returns:
        Profiles represents Profile collection of specified context template ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteFetchSample

        Fetcher<Profile> remoteFetchSample()
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely collection of Profile (s) of sample via Fetcher. Profile contains associative information of a given subject: user, item, context, etc. For example, profile of item ID 1 can contains: Computer COM1, CPU Intel, 2GB RAM.
        Returns:
        Fetcher of profiles of sample.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteCatchup

        Dataset remoteCatchup()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remotely the Snapshot of this Dataset remotely. If this Dataset is Snapshot, the method returns this Dataset.
        Returns:
        Snapshot created from this Dataset
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteSelectByContexts

        Dataset remoteSelectByContexts(ContextList contexts)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creating remotely the sub Dataset (filtered Dataset) of this Dataset by selecting ratings whose contexts are in the specified context list. Context represents time, location, companion associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. Please see Context and ContextList for more details of context and context list.
        Parameters:
        contexts - Specified context list
        Returns:
        Sub Dataset whose contexts are in the specified context list
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteIsExclusive

        boolean remoteIsExclusive()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Checking remotely whether or not this Dataset is exclusive. Dataset is often loaded and feed to the Recommender algorithm via method Recommender#setup(Dataset, Object...). If this Dataset is in exclusive mode, it is clear (method clear()} is called) when method Recommender#unsetup() is called (Recommender algorithm is stopped).
        Returns:
        Whether or not this Dataset is exclusive
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteGetCTSchema

        ContextTemplateSchema remoteGetCTSchema()
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getting remotely schema of context template ContextTemplate. ContextTemplate is template for a context represented by the class Context. Context includes time, location, companion, etc. associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. For example, Time is the template for time context 31/10/2015 6:45. In other words, context is an instance of context template with specific value. A set of context templates is structured as the model which is called context template schema represented by interface ContextTemplateSchema. Please see Context, ContextTemplate and ContextTemplateSchema for more details of context, context template and context template schema.
        Returns:
        ContextTemplateSchema
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteExport

        DatasetRemote remoteExport(int serverPort)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote exporting this remote dataset.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - server port.
        Returns:
        stub as remote dataset. Return null if exporting fails.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • remoteUnexport

        void remoteUnexport()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Remote unexporting remote dataset.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.
